queries.name: Find all Domain Admins

queryList.query: MATCH p=(n:Group)<-[:MemberOf*1..]-(m) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name RETURN p

queries.name: Map Domain Trusts

queryList.query: MATCH p=(n:Domain)-->(m:Domain) RETURN p

queries.name: Find Computers with Unsupported Operating Systems

queryList.query: MATCH (n:Computer) WHERE n.operatingsystem =~ "(?i).*(2000|2003|2008|xp|vista|7|me).*" RETURN n

queries.name: Find Principals with DCSync Rights

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=()-[:DCSync|AllExtendedRights|GenericAll]->(:Domain {name: $result}) RETURN p

queries.name: Users with Foreign Domain Group Membership

queryList.title: Select source domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=(n:User)-[:MemberOf]->(m:Group) WHERE n.domain=$result AND m.domain<>n.domain RETURN p

queries.name: Groups with Foreign Domain Group Membership

queryList.title: Select source domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=(n:Group {domain:$result})-[:MemberOf]->(m:Group) WHERE m.domain<>n.domain AND n.name<>m.name RETURN p

queries.name: Find Computers where Domain Users are Local Admin

queryList.title: Select a Domain Users Group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid ENDS WITH "-513" RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=(m:Group {name:$result})-[:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Find Computers where Domain Users can read LAPS passwords

queryList.title: Select a Domain Users Group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid ENDS WITH '-513' RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=(Group {name:$result})-[:MemberOf*0..]->(g:Group)-[:AllExtendedRights|ReadLAPSPassword]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Find All Paths from Domain Users to High Value Targets

queryList.title: Select a Domain Users Group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid ENDS WITH "-513" RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=shortestPath((g:Group {name:$result})-[*1..]->(n {highvalue:true})) WHERE g<>n return p

queries.name: Find Workstations where Domain Users can RDP

queryList.title: Select a Domain Users Group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid ENDS WITH "-513" RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
match p=(g:Group {name:$result})-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer) where NOT c.operatingsystem CONTAINS "Server" return p

queries.name: Find Servers where Domain Users can RDP

queryList.title: Select a Domain Users Group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid ENDS WITH "-513" RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=(g:Group {name:$result})-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer) WHERE c.operatingsystem CONTAINS "Server" return p

queries.name: Find Dangerous Privileges for Domain Users Groups

queryList.title: Select a Domain Users Group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid ENDS WITH "-513" RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=(m:Group)-[:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|GenericWrite|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword]->(n:Computer) WHERE m.objectid ENDS WITH "-513" RETURN p

queries.name: Find Domain Admin Logons to non-Domain Controllers

queryList.query: MATCH (dc)-[r:MemberOf*0..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-516' WITH COLLECT(dc) AS exclude MATCH p = (c:Computer)-[n:HasSession]->(u:User)-[r2:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE  g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' AND NOT c IN exclude RETURN p

queries.name: Find Kerberoastable Members of High Value Groups

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((n:User)-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group)) WHERE g.highvalue=true AND n.hasspn=true RETURN p

queries.name: List all Kerberoastable Accounts

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User)WHERE n.hasspn=true RETURN n

queries.name: Find Kerberoastable Users with most privileges

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {hasspn:true}) OPTIONAL MATCH (u)-[:AdminTo]->(c1:Computer) OPTIONAL MATCH (u)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(:Group)-[:AdminTo]->(c2:Computer) WITH u,COLLECT(c1) + COLLECT(c2) AS tempVar UNWIND tempVar AS comps RETURN u.name,COUNT(DISTINCT(comps)) ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT(comps)) DESC

queries.name: Find AS-REP Roastable Users (DontReqPreAuth)

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {dontreqpreauth: true}) RETURN u

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Unconstrained Delegation Systems

queryList.query: MATCH (n) MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[:{}*1..]->(m:Computer {unconstraineddelegation: true})) WHERE NOT n=m RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths from Kerberoastable Users

queryList.title: Select a domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

queryList.title: Select a user
queryList.query: MATCH (n:User) WHERE n.domain=$result AND n.hasspn=true RETURN n.name, n.pwdlastset ORDER BY n.pwdlastset ASC
MATCH p=shortestPath((a:User {name:$result})-[:{}*1..]->(b:Computer)) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Domain Admins from Kerberoastable Users

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=shortestPath((n:User {hasspn:true})-[:{}*1..]->(m:Group {name:$result})) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Path from Owned Principals

queryList.title: Select a domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

queryList.title: Select a user
queryList.query: MATCH (n) WHERE n.domain=$result AND n.owned=true RETURN n.name, n.PwdLastSet ORDER BY n.PwdLastSet ASC
MATCH p=shortestPath((a {name:$result})-[:{}*1..]->(b:Computer)) WHERE NOT a=b RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Domain Admins from Owned Principals

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=shortestPath((n {owned:true})-[:{}*1..]->(m:Group {name:$result})) WHERE NOT n=m RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to High Value Targets

queryList.title: Select a Domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[*1..]->(m {highvalue:true})) WHERE m.domain=$result AND m<>n RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths from Domain Users to High Value Targets

queryList.title: Select a Domain Users Group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid ENDS WITH "-513" RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=shortestPath((g:Group {name:$result})-[*1..]->(n {highvalue:true})) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH "-513" AND g<>n return p

queries.name: Find Shortest Paths to Domain Admins

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[:{}*1..]->(m:Group {name:$result})) WHERE NOT n=m RETURN p
